info.name: Olive
info.description: The olive is an oval-shaped bulge on the ventral lateral aspect of the medulla. The inferior olivary nucleus is located inside of this elevated area.
info.item: /Gross/Brain stem & Cerebellum/Brain stem/2 Cranial nerves-I to X + XII
